This is not because the brain is cold, but because it needs large quantities of blood to engender a great quantity of humors which are necessary for its principal functions. And as in all this blood there is very little that can serve as nourishment for the brain, there is a great deal left over, which is called excrement. utterances.text: Va a ser el demonio o va a ser una, como lo que decía también Santa Teresa, a ver si esos llantos van a ser una melancolía. Vamos a ver todas de la melancolía.
utterances.text_en: It will be the devil or it will be one, as St. Teresa also said, to see if those cries are going to be a melancholy. Let's see all the melancholy.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: En la conclusión de hoy es cuidado con la tiranía de querer estar guapa cuando se llora. A lo mejor tienes que dejar que te caigan los ojos.
utterances.text_en: In today's conclusion is beware of the tyranny of wanting to look pretty when you cry. Maybe you have to let your eyes fall out.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Después de todo este delirio geográfico.
utterances.text_en: After all this geographical delirium.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Analízate tú, analízate, categoriza, taxonomiza tu llanto. Y sobre todo, porque esto también se dice mucho, no llores sola ni delante de muchísima gente. Llora delante de contaditas con una mano. Esto es una cosa que no hemos dicho en el episodio, pero me acabo.
utterances.text_en: Analyze yourself, analyze yourself, categorize, taxonomize your crying. And above all, because this is also said a lot, do not cry alone or in front of many people. Cry in front of a handful of people. This is something we didn't say in the episode, but I'm done.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: De sacar yo y puedo hacer una última cosa que no he hecho. Puedo como dedicar el episodio, solo se lo quiero dedicar a las amigas y las novias que en la distancia aguantan todos nuestros pesares, que son muchas, son un puñadito de personas. Ellas saben quiénes son, que están ahí al pie del cañón.
utterances.text_en: I can do one last thing that I haven't done. I can like dedicate the episode, I just want to dedicate it to the friends and girlfriends who in the distance endure all our sorrows, which are many, they are a handful of people. They know who they are, who are there at the foot of the cannon.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Sí, muchas gracias.
utterances.text_en: Yes, thank you very much.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hasta dentro de dos semanas.
utterances.text_en: See you in two weeks.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Oye, Lidia, ponte las pilas. Oye, Lidia, no haces nada. Oye, oye, Lidia, no vales, eres una mierda.
utterances.text_en: Hey, Lidia, get your act together. Hey, Lidia, you're not doing anything. Hey, hey, Lidia, you're not worth it, you're shit.

utterances.speaker: C
utterances.text: Preterarme por la presa y que mis directores no me lo hayan dicho, hombre, por favor. Qué menos, qué menos, qué menos.
utterances.text_en: Preterarme by the dam and that my directors have not told me, man, please. What less, what less, what less.

utterances.speaker: B

Producción ejecutiva, Lourdes Moreno Cazalla. Escucha todos los episodios en Podium Podcast y todos los agregadores de audio.
